RShiny XWAS App

Author

Sai 

#| standalone: true

library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
library(shiny)
library(dplyr)
# library(htmlwidgets)

path_to_full_spredixcan_results = "spredixcan_results_full.txt"

full_spredixcan_results = read.table(path_to_full_spredixcan_results, header = T, sep = "\t")
print(head(full_spredixcan_results))

full_spredixcan_results$neglog10p = -log10(full_spredixcan_results$pvalue)
print(head(full_spredixcan_results))
print(colnames(full_spredixcan_results))

full_spredixcan_results$bonferroni_p <- full_spredixcan_results$pvalue*length(full_spredixcan_results$pvalue)
full_spredixcan_results$bp_sig <- ifelse(full_spredixcan_results$bonferroni_p < 0.05, 
                                    ifelse(full_spredixcan_results$bonferroni_p < 0.005, 
                                      ifelse(full_spredixcan_results$bonferroni_p < 0.0005,"***","**"), "*"), "")

path_to_gwas_loci_data <- "loci_tables.rds"

gwas_loci_data <- readRDS(path_to_gwas_loci_data)

# Sample data for select inputs
facet_variables <- c("condition", "modality")
x_variables <- c("condition", "modality")
color_variables <- c("neglog10p", "effect_size", "var_g")
hover_variables <- c("gene_name", "condition", "modality", "neglog10p","effect_size","var_g","n_snps_used","n_snps_in_model","zscore","pvalue")

create_dynamic_ucsc_url <- function(chr, start, end, half_window_size=500000) {

  base_ucsc_genome_browser_url_start = "https://genome.ucsc.edu/cgi-bin/hgTracks?db=hg38&lastVirtModeType=default&lastVirtModeExtraState=&virtModeType=default&virtMode=0&nonVirtPosition=&"

  start = as.numeric(start) - half_window_size
  end = as.numeric(end) + half_window_size

  if (start < 0) {
    start = 0
  }

  position = paste0("position=", chr, "%3A", start, "%2D", end)

  dynamic_ucsc_url = paste0(base_ucsc_genome_browser_url_start, position)

  return(dynamic_ucsc_url)

}

dynamic_ucsc_url <- create_dynamic_ucsc_url("1", "1000000", "2000000")
print(test_url)

prepare_XWAS_dataset <- function(df, categorical_vars) {

  categorical_factor_list <- list()
  for (categorical_var in categorical_vars) {
    categorical_factor_list[[categorical_var]] <- sort(as.vector(unique(df[[categorical_var]])), decreasing = F)
  }

  return(categorical_factor_list)
}

find_data_point_from_coord_data <- function(categorical_factor_list, x_var, y_var, x_coord, y_coord) {
  x_coord_int = round(x_coord)
  y_coord_int = round(y_coord)

  x_data_point = categorical_factor_list[[x_var]][x_coord_int]
  y_data_point = categorical_factor_list[[y_var]][y_coord_int]

  return(list(xval=x_data_point, gene=y_data_point))
}

categorical_factor_list <- prepare_XWAS_dataset(full_spredixcan_results, c(facet_variables, "gene"))
print(categorical_factor_list)

for (categorical_var in names(categorical_factor_list)) {
  levels(full_spredixcan_results[[categorical_var]]) <- categorical_factor_list[[categorical_var]]
}

ui <- navbarPage("XWAS App",
                  # First tab panel highlighting the XWAS results splittable by multiple factors
                  tabPanel("XWAS",
                    fluidPage(
                      fluidRow(
                        headerPanel("")
                      ),
                      fluidRow(
                        column(4,
                          h4("Change Plot Settings"),
                          selectInput("select_facet_variable",
                                    "Select facet variable",
                                    choices = facet_variables,
                                    selected = facet_variables[1]
                                    ),
                          selectInput("select_x_variable",
                                    "Select x variable",
                                    choices = x_variables,
                                    selected = x_variables[1]
                                    ),
                          selectInput("select_color_variable",
                                    "Select color variable",
                                    choices = color_variables,
                                    selected = color_variables[1]
                                    )
                        ),
                        column(8
                          )
                      ),
                      fluidRow(
                        column(6,plotOutput("plot1", click = "plot_click")),
                                #   hover = hoverOpts(id = "plot_hover", delay = 100, delayType = "throttle")),
                                # uiOutput("hover_info")),
                        column(6,absolutePanel(
                            tableOutput("click_table"),
                            fixed=TRUE,
                            draggable=TRUE,
                            top="10%",
                            bottom="25%",
                            left="60%",
                          )
                        )
                      )
                    )
                ),
                # Second tab panel highlighting information of the selected locus
                tabPanel("Locus",
                  fluidPage(
                    fluidRow(
                      headerPanel(""),
                      headerPanel("")
                    ),
                    fluidRow(
                      h1("Locus Info"),
                      h2("GWAS summary stats at locus LD block")
                    ),
                    fluidRow(
                      plotOutput("GWAS_locus_plot"),
                    ),
                      fluidRow(
                      h2("Genome browser at locus")
                    ),
                    fluidRow(
                      column(12, 
                          htmlOutput("iframe"), 
                          style="z-index:100;"
                          # verbatimTextOutput("data_point"),
                        )
                    )
                  )
                ),
  position = "fixed-top"
)


server <- function(input, output, session) {
  observe({
    facet_variable <- input$select_facet_variable
    second_x_variable <- facet_variables[facet_variables != facet_variable]
    
    updateSelectInput(session,
                      'select_x_variable',
                      choices = second_x_variable,
                      selected = second_x_variable[1])
  })

  # Plot1 - Facet = Modality, x = condition
  output$plot1 <- renderPlot({
    ggplot(full_spredixcan_results, aes_string(x = input$select_x_variable, y = "gene", fill = input$select_color_variable)) +
    geom_raster() + 
    geom_text(aes(label=bp_sig)) +
    scale_fill_gradient(low = "white", high = "red") +
    ggtitle("XWAS of fine-mapped Allergy Eczema Loci") +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1)) +
    facet_grid(cols = vars(full_spredixcan_results[[input$select_facet_variable]]), scales = "free", space = "free_y")
  }, height = 1200, width = 600)

  # Plot2 - GWAS locus plot

  output$GWAS_locus_plot <- renderPlot({
    click_data <- input$plot_click
    if (is.null(click_data)) {
      return("Click on the plot to see data points")
    }
    x_coord = click_data$x
    y_coord = click_data$y

    data_point <- find_data_point_from_coord_data(categorical_factor_list, input$select_x_variable, "gene", x_coord, y_coord)

    loci_table_for_plot <- gwas_loci_data[[data_point$gene]]
    print(colnames(loci_table_for_plot))

    ggplot(loci_table_for_plot, aes(x = pos, y = -log10(pval), color = is_loci)) +
    geom_point() +
    scale_color_manual(values = c("black", "red")) +
    labs(title = data_point[["gene"]],
         x = "Position",
         y = "-log10(p-value)")
  })

  # Add responsive genome browser
  output$iframe <- renderUI({

    click_data <- input$plot_click

    if (is.null(click_data)) {
      ui_lnk <- tags$iframe(src=dynamic_ucsc_url, height=600, width=900, frameborder = "no")
      ui_lnk
    } else {
      x_coord = click_data$x
      y_coord = click_data$y

      data_point <- find_data_point_from_coord_data(categorical_factor_list, input$select_x_variable, "gene", x_coord, y_coord)
      data_point[["facet_var_value"]] <- click_data$panelvar1
      data_point$x_coord <- x_coord
      data_point$y_coord <- y_coord

      loci <- data_point$gene
      split_loci <- strsplit(loci, "_")[[1]]
      dynamic_ucsc_url = create_dynamic_ucsc_url(split_loci[1], split_loci[2], split_loci[3])
      print(dynamic_ucsc_url)
      new_iframe <- tags$iframe(src=dynamic_ucsc_url, height=600, width=100%, frameborder = "yes")
      new_iframe
    }
  })



  # Show data on click
  output$click_table <- renderTable({
    click_data <- input$plot_click
    if (is.null(click_data)) {
      return("Click on the plot to see data points")
    }
    x_coord = click_data$x
    y_coord = click_data$y
    data_point <- find_data_point_from_coord_data(categorical_factor_list, input$select_x_variable, "gene", x_coord, y_coord)
    data_point$facet_var_value <- click_data$panelvar1
    data_point$x_coord <- x_coord
    data_point$y_coord <- y_coord

    # print(head(full_spredixcan_results))

    # print("gene")
    # print(data_point$gene)
    # print(full_spredixcan_results[["gene"]] == data_point$gene)
    # print("xval")
    # print(input$select_x_variable)
    # print(data_point$xval)
    # print(full_spredixcan_results[input$select_x_variable] == str(data_point$xval))
    # print("facet_var_value")
    # print(input$select_facet_variable)
    # print(data_point[["facet_var_value"]])
    # print(full_spredixcan_results[input$select_y_variable] == str(data_point[["facet_var_value"]]))

    filter_bool <- full_spredixcan_results["gene"] == data_point$gene & 
        full_spredixcan_results[input$select_x_variable] == data_point$xval &
        full_spredixcan_results[input$select_facet_variable] == data_point$facet_var_value

    # print(filter_bool)

    filtered_table <- full_spredixcan_results %>%
      filter(filter_bool) %>%
      t()

    rownames(filtered_table) <- colnames(full_spredixcan_results)

    # print("filtered table")
    # print(filtered_table)

    filtered_table

  },
  rownames = TRUE)


}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
Source Code

title: "RShiny XWAS App"
filters:

```{shinylive-r}
#| standalone: true

library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
library(shiny)
library(dplyr)
# library(htmlwidgets)

path_to_full_spredixcan_results = "spredixcan_results_full.txt"

full_spredixcan_results = read.table(path_to_full_spredixcan_results, header = T, sep = "\t")
print(head(full_spredixcan_results))

full_spredixcan_results$neglog10p = -log10(full_spredixcan_results$pvalue)
print(head(full_spredixcan_results))
print(colnames(full_spredixcan_results))

full_spredixcan_results$bonferroni_p <- full_spredixcan_results$pvalue*length(full_spredixcan_results$pvalue)
full_spredixcan_results$bp_sig <- ifelse(full_spredixcan_results$bonferroni_p < 0.05, 
                                    ifelse(full_spredixcan_results$bonferroni_p < 0.005, 
                                      ifelse(full_spredixcan_results$bonferroni_p < 0.0005,"***","**"), "*"), "")

path_to_gwas_loci_data <- "loci_tables.rds"

gwas_loci_data <- readRDS(path_to_gwas_loci_data)

# Sample data for select inputs
facet_variables <- c("condition", "modality")
x_variables <- c("condition", "modality")
color_variables <- c("neglog10p", "effect_size", "var_g")
hover_variables <- c("gene_name", "condition", "modality", "neglog10p","effect_size","var_g","n_snps_used","n_snps_in_model","zscore","pvalue")

create_dynamic_ucsc_url <- function(chr, start, end, half_window_size=500000) {

  base_ucsc_genome_browser_url_start = "https://genome.ucsc.edu/cgi-bin/hgTracks?db=hg38&lastVirtModeType=default&lastVirtModeExtraState=&virtModeType=default&virtMode=0&nonVirtPosition=&"

  start = as.numeric(start) - half_window_size
  end = as.numeric(end) + half_window_size

  if (start < 0) {
    start = 0
  }

  position = paste0("position=", chr, "%3A", start, "%2D", end)

  dynamic_ucsc_url = paste0(base_ucsc_genome_browser_url_start, position)

  return(dynamic_ucsc_url)

}

dynamic_ucsc_url <- create_dynamic_ucsc_url("1", "1000000", "2000000")
print(test_url)

prepare_XWAS_dataset <- function(df, categorical_vars) {

  categorical_factor_list <- list()
  for (categorical_var in categorical_vars) {
    categorical_factor_list[[categorical_var]] <- sort(as.vector(unique(df[[categorical_var]])), decreasing = F)
  }

  return(categorical_factor_list)
}

find_data_point_from_coord_data <- function(categorical_factor_list, x_var, y_var, x_coord, y_coord) {
  x_coord_int = round(x_coord)
  y_coord_int = round(y_coord)

  x_data_point = categorical_factor_list[[x_var]][x_coord_int]
  y_data_point = categorical_factor_list[[y_var]][y_coord_int]

  return(list(xval=x_data_point, gene=y_data_point))
}

categorical_factor_list <- prepare_XWAS_dataset(full_spredixcan_results, c(facet_variables, "gene"))
print(categorical_factor_list)

for (categorical_var in names(categorical_factor_list)) {
  levels(full_spredixcan_results[[categorical_var]]) <- categorical_factor_list[[categorical_var]]
}

ui <- navbarPage("XWAS App",
                  # First tab panel highlighting the XWAS results splittable by multiple factors
                  tabPanel("XWAS",
                    fluidPage(
                      fluidRow(
                        headerPanel("")
                      ),
                      fluidRow(
                        column(4,
                          h4("Change Plot Settings"),
                          selectInput("select_facet_variable",
                                    "Select facet variable",
                                    choices = facet_variables,
                                    selected = facet_variables[1]
                                    ),
                          selectInput("select_x_variable",
                                    "Select x variable",
                                    choices = x_variables,
                                    selected = x_variables[1]
                                    ),
                          selectInput("select_color_variable",
                                    "Select color variable",
                                    choices = color_variables,
                                    selected = color_variables[1]
                                    )
                        ),
                        column(8
                          )
                      ),
                      fluidRow(
                        column(6,plotOutput("plot1", click = "plot_click")),
                                #   hover = hoverOpts(id = "plot_hover", delay = 100, delayType = "throttle")),
                                # uiOutput("hover_info")),
                        column(6,absolutePanel(
                            tableOutput("click_table"),
                            fixed=TRUE,
                            draggable=TRUE,
                            top="10%",
                            bottom="25%",
                            left="60%",
                          )
                        )
                      )
                    )
                ),
                # Second tab panel highlighting information of the selected locus
                tabPanel("Locus",
                  fluidPage(
                    fluidRow(
                      headerPanel(""),
                      headerPanel("")
                    ),
                    fluidRow(
                      h1("Locus Info"),
                      h2("GWAS summary stats at locus LD block")
                    ),
                    fluidRow(
                      plotOutput("GWAS_locus_plot"),
                    ),
                      fluidRow(
                      h2("Genome browser at locus")
                    ),
                    fluidRow(
                      column(12, 
                          htmlOutput("iframe"), 
                          style="z-index:100;"
                          # verbatimTextOutput("data_point"),
                        )
                    )
                  )
                ),
  position = "fixed-top"
)


server <- function(input, output, session) {
  observe({
    facet_variable <- input$select_facet_variable
    second_x_variable <- facet_variables[facet_variables != facet_variable]
    
    updateSelectInput(session,
                      'select_x_variable',
                      choices = second_x_variable,
                      selected = second_x_variable[1])
  })

  # Plot1 - Facet = Modality, x = condition
  output$plot1 <- renderPlot({
    ggplot(full_spredixcan_results, aes_string(x = input$select_x_variable, y = "gene", fill = input$select_color_variable)) +
    geom_raster() + 
    geom_text(aes(label=bp_sig)) +
    scale_fill_gradient(low = "white", high = "red") +
    ggtitle("XWAS of fine-mapped Allergy Eczema Loci") +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1)) +
    facet_grid(cols = vars(full_spredixcan_results[[input$select_facet_variable]]), scales = "free", space = "free_y")
  }, height = 1200, width = 600)

  # Plot2 - GWAS locus plot

  output$GWAS_locus_plot <- renderPlot({
    click_data <- input$plot_click
    if (is.null(click_data)) {
      return("Click on the plot to see data points")
    }
    x_coord = click_data$x
    y_coord = click_data$y

    data_point <- find_data_point_from_coord_data(categorical_factor_list, input$select_x_variable, "gene", x_coord, y_coord)

    loci_table_for_plot <- gwas_loci_data[[data_point$gene]]
    print(colnames(loci_table_for_plot))

    ggplot(loci_table_for_plot, aes(x = pos, y = -log10(pval), color = is_loci)) +
    geom_point() +
    scale_color_manual(values = c("black", "red")) +
    labs(title = data_point[["gene"]],
         x = "Position",
         y = "-log10(p-value)")
  })

  # Add responsive genome browser
  output$iframe <- renderUI({

    click_data <- input$plot_click

    if (is.null(click_data)) {
      ui_lnk <- tags$iframe(src=dynamic_ucsc_url, height=600, width=900, frameborder = "no")
      ui_lnk
    } else {
      x_coord = click_data$x
      y_coord = click_data$y

      data_point <- find_data_point_from_coord_data(categorical_factor_list, input$select_x_variable, "gene", x_coord, y_coord)
      data_point[["facet_var_value"]] <- click_data$panelvar1
      data_point$x_coord <- x_coord
      data_point$y_coord <- y_coord

      loci <- data_point$gene
      split_loci <- strsplit(loci, "_")[[1]]
      dynamic_ucsc_url = create_dynamic_ucsc_url(split_loci[1], split_loci[2], split_loci[3])
      print(dynamic_ucsc_url)
      new_iframe <- tags$iframe(src=dynamic_ucsc_url, height=600, width=100%, frameborder = "yes")
      new_iframe
    }
  })



  # Show data on click
  output$click_table <- renderTable({
    click_data <- input$plot_click
    if (is.null(click_data)) {
      return("Click on the plot to see data points")
    }
    x_coord = click_data$x
    y_coord = click_data$y
    data_point <- find_data_point_from_coord_data(categorical_factor_list, input$select_x_variable, "gene", x_coord, y_coord)
    data_point$facet_var_value <- click_data$panelvar1
    data_point$x_coord <- x_coord
    data_point$y_coord <- y_coord

    # print(head(full_spredixcan_results))

    # print("gene")
    # print(data_point$gene)
    # print(full_spredixcan_results[["gene"]] == data_point$gene)
    # print("xval")
    # print(input$select_x_variable)
    # print(data_point$xval)
    # print(full_spredixcan_results[input$select_x_variable] == str(data_point$xval))
    # print("facet_var_value")
    # print(input$select_facet_variable)
    # print(data_point[["facet_var_value"]])
    # print(full_spredixcan_results[input$select_y_variable] == str(data_point[["facet_var_value"]]))

    filter_bool <- full_spredixcan_results["gene"] == data_point$gene & 
        full_spredixcan_results[input$select_x_variable] == data_point$xval &
        full_spredixcan_results[input$select_facet_variable] == data_point$facet_var_value

    # print(filter_bool)

    filtered_table <- full_spredixcan_results %>%
      filter(filter_bool) %>%
      t()

    rownames(filtered_table) <- colnames(full_spredixcan_results)

    # print("filtered table")
    # print(filtered_table)

    filtered_table

  },
  rownames = TRUE)


}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)

```
